snippet: It's not entirely clear how the Miami Dolphins will use their running backs on Thursday night, but Buffalo Bills are the best fantasy matchup for running backs, allowing 28 points per game.
abstract: It's not entirely clear how the Miami Dolphins will use their running backs on Thursday night, but Buffalo Bills are the best fantasy matchup for running backs, allowing 28 points per game.

byline.original: By JUSTIN SABLICH and JASON SABLICH

headline.main: Week 11 in Fantasy Football: Bills vs. Dolphins
